song_lyric:
作曲 : 王梓鑫
 作词 : PISSY
REVOLUTION
FILTHY FREESTYLE
OLYMPIC WINTER GAMES
Korea
You know it’s all a shame
FILTHY FILTHY
What can I say now?
You can close your door and play the game yourself
Efforts in vain, how?
Got paper and pen
You can wear the gold crown
got no shame about it
Host of the game
Be the ghost of the game
Got it frozen again
like a stutter
But my angers out
Ah wait, are you serious?
Your speed skating
you are Blade The Series
sport games
What’s the spirit?
what a fair play！
Kinda hilarious
Get your judges out
Let’s see how much
illicit money they got
Let’s see how bad their nightmares are
Let’s see how dirty their consciences are
Alright alright
I buy you gold medals and trophies and rings
and we give you everything
The world is yours, the world is yours
Your intelligent people are the god of us all
This is not the first time
You know FIFA World Cup 02
You’ve crossed the line
How many 4 years do all these players have
You’ve ruined half
You should feel sorry about that
This is Korea, huh?
I mean all the judges
all the Blades
all the audiences
all are fakers?
As asians, we lose our faces
You made the game your Commendation Congress
and a combination of hurt and fraud
Now congratulations, you are the winner of it
Fool, but you’ve broken the rules, a lose
Olympic Winter Game
Who’s gon be the winner?
I lay 5 bucks Koreans win all the prizes
What?
Wu Dajing got the gold medal?
can’t imagine
Koreans couldn’t even touch him
This time, would the judge say it’s an overspeed?
FILTHY！
